Title: Moody Foodie
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu, Nora Smith (story)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: A bad review leads to drastic actions.
